TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LogicalMethodInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents the attributes and metadata for an XML Web service method.

span.span: Represents the attributes and metadata for an XML Web service method.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要由使用的 SOAP 扩展以便询问与其 SOAP 扩展配置为运行 XML Web service 方法的详细信息。 is used primarily by a SOAP extension to interrogate the details of the XML Web service method with which the SOAP extension is configured to run. 根据 SOAP 扩展的配置方式，它可以找出有关中的 XML Web 服务方法的详细信息方法采用。Depending on how the SOAP extension is configured, it can find out details about the XML Web service method in the method of that takes a . 访问提供的详细信息，如 XML Web service 方法的参数属性和任何自定义特性应用于 XML Web 服务方法使用属性。The provides details such as the XML Web service method's parameters by accessing the property and any custom attributes applied to the XML Web service method using the property. 有关 SOAP 扩展的详细信息，请参阅类或[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97d81ace-95e7-4acc-ae39-9692a0021e95)。For more details on SOAP extensions see the class or [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97d81ace-95e7-4acc-ae39-9692a0021e95).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AsyncCallbackParameter As ParameterInfo
public: property System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ AsyncCallbackParameter { System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the parameter information for the parameter of a Begin method in an asynchronous invocation.

span.span: Gets the parameter information for the parameter of a Begin method in an asynchronous invocation.

value.span: A表示参数异步方法调用。

span.span: A representing the parameter of a asynchronous method invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时中的异步设计模式涉及调用`Begin`方法来开始异步方法调用和`End`来完成调用的方法。The asynchronous design pattern in the common language runtime involves calling a `Begin` method to start the asynchronous method invocation and an `End` method to complete the invocation. `Begin`方法采用除了同步版本的方法定义的参数的两个其他参数： 一个以用于存储委托，而另一个存储任何需要传递给委托的状态信息。The `Begin` method takes two additional parameters besides the parameters defined by the synchronous version of the method: one to store a delegate and one to store any state information that needs to be passed on to the delegate. 此属性表示该委托的参数名称与参数`AsyncCallback`。This property represents the parameter for the delegate with a parameter name of `AsyncCallback`. 以异步方式调用 XML Web 服务的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9e26a43-063a-440a-8c73-a02f2ccf3ea0)。For more information on invoking XML Web services asynchronously, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9e26a43-063a-440a-8c73-a02f2ccf3ea0). ## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CS/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/VB/logicalmethodinfo_create2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AsyncResultParameter As ParameterInfo
public: property System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ AsyncResultParameter { System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the return value of a asynchronous method invocation.

span.span: Gets the return value of a asynchronous method invocation.

value.span: A表示从返回异步方法调用。

span.span: A representing the returned from a asynchronous method invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时中的异步设计模式涉及调用`Begin`方法来开始异步方法调用和`End`来完成调用的方法。The asynchronous design pattern in the common language runtime involves calling a `Begin` method to start the asynchronous method invocation and an `End` method to complete the invocation. `Begin`方法通常会立即返回一个对象，实现与接口，然后传递给`End`在以后完成的异步方法调用的方法。The `Begin` method typically returns immediately with an object implementing the interface, which can then be passed to the `End` method at a later time to complete the asynchronous method invocation. 返回的对象实现接口表示此属性。The returned object implementing the interface is represented by this property. 以异步方式调用 XML Web 服务的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9e26a43-063a-440a-8c73-a02f2ccf3ea0)。For more information on invoking XML Web services asynchronously, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9e26a43-063a-440a-8c73-a02f2ccf3ea0). ## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CS/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/VB/logicalmethodinfo_create2.vb#1)]

value.span: A表示参数异步调用中的方法。

span.span: A representing the parameter of a method in an asynchronous invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时中的异步设计模式涉及调用`Begin`方法来开始异步方法调用和`End`来完成调用的方法。The asynchronous design pattern in the common language runtime involves calling a `Begin` method to start the asynchronous method invocation and an `End` method to complete the invocation. `Begin`方法采用除了同步版本的方法定义的参数的两个其他参数： 一个以用于存储委托，而另一个存储任何需要传递给委托的状态信息。The `Begin` method takes two additional parameters besides the parameters defined by the synchronous version of the method: one to store a delegate and one to store any state information that needs to be passed on to the delegate. 此属性表示需要传递到委托的状态信息。This property represents the state information that needs to be passed into the delegate. 以异步方式调用 XML Web 服务的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9e26a43-063a-440a-8c73-a02f2ccf3ea0)。For more information on invoking XML Web services asynchronously, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9e26a43-063a-440a-8c73-a02f2ccf3ea0). ## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CS/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/VB/logicalmethodinfo_create2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性检索的引用声明此成员的类型。The property retrieves a reference to a for the type that declares this member. 类 （或接口） 的成员声明或继承自基类 （或接口）。A member of a class (or interface) is either declared or inherited from a base class (or interface). 返回可能不是相同实现 XML Web 服务的类 (如果该类派生自的基类，并且在该基类中声明此类所表示的方法则返回基本的类）。The returned might not be the same as the of the class implementing the XML Web service (if that class derives from a base class and the method represented by this class is declared in that base class then the returned is the base class). ## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_constructor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor/CS/logicalmethodinfo_constructor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor/VB/logicalmethodinfo_constructor.vb#1)]
